channel.title: **My first project , First HOSTED server without hamachi**
channel.description:
To start off, i am very proud that this is not using hamachi :)
Second thing here are some screenshots (more will be added soon ); [img]http://grandgaming.co.cc/pic1.bmp[/img] [img]http://grandgaming.co.cc/pic2.bmp[/img]
I am currently working on setting up woodcutting area and buy and sell area for many items. There will also be a PVP area for people to come, its a no leave zone.
What i need to fix: I need to make it where you drop items... (any help??)
Another thing that i like is our uptime: [b]95[/b]%!

item.title: **My first project , First HOSTED server without hamachi**
item.dc:creator: @doggiedoo86 doggiedoo86
item.description:
@doggiedoo86 wrote:

Well, i mean;

2 people in wilderness
1 person dies (needs to loss stuff)
Spawns with all items and doesn’t loss anything

What i want:
2 people in wilderness
1 person dies
Spawns with nothing because his items were dropped where he died

Read full topic
